text: The Biloxi Sun Herald suggests that Reggie Bush (knee) could be shut down for the remainder of the Saints' season. Beat writer Larry Holder puts this in a one liner, saying Bush "could sit out the final two games. '' It may be speculative, or Holder has reasoning behind it that he does n't give. We 'll know more about Bush Wednesday, when the Saints practice and hopefully reveal the results of his MRI.
title: Saints could shut down Reggie Bush?
